## Career

Calderón was a member of the Puerto Rico House of Representatives from 1985 to 1992. She was a member of the New Progressive Party (PNP) and was the first woman to serve as President of the PNP.

### Governor of Puerto Rico

Calderón was elected Governor of Puerto Rico in 2000, defeating the incumbent governor, Pedro Rosselló. She was the first woman to be elected governor of Puerto Rico.

input: Write a short biography of Xi Jinping.
output:
### 1. 简介

Xi Jinping (習近平) is the current General Secretary of the Communist Party of China (中国共产党) and President of the People's Republic of China (中华人民共和国). He is the first Chinese leader to be born after the founding of the People's Republic of China in 1949.

### 2. 生平

G. Venugopal was born in 1955 in Kollam, Kerala. He completed his schooling from Kollam and graduated from the University of Kerala. He then completed his master's degree in English literature from the University of Kerala.

## Career

output:
Rangi Te Kanawa

## Early life

Rangi Te Kanawa was born in 1880 in the village of Te Kuiti, New Zealand. He was the son of Te Kanawa and his wife, Te Kuiti. He was the grandson of Te Kanawa, a chief of the Ngāti Manawa hapu of Ngāti Tūwharetoa.

## Career

Te Kanawa was a member of the New Zealand Legislative Council from 1922 to 1925. He was a member of the New Zealand Legislative Council from 1925 to 1930.

## Death

Te Kanawa died in 1930.
